messages.text:
Hi, I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant by HeyGen. Let's create a short nature documentary video based on your request!
Here's my proposed plan (I've predicted some details like audience, length, and visuals since they weren't specifiedâ€”feel free to adjust):





















































TopicA short nature documentary exploring the beauty of forests, wildlife, and ecosystems.AudienceGeneral viewers interested in nature and relaxation.Music ThemeCalming ambient sounds with soft orchestral elements to evoke serenity.Video LengthRoughly 30 seconds (short-form to fit auto duration; we can extend if needed).Video OrientationPortrait.Script PlanThe script will be automatically generated based on the topic, including a narrated overview of forest life, key facts, and a call to appreciate nature.Target LanguageEnglish (United States).AvatarOne professional adult narrator (middle-aged male with a neutral, approachable look).VoiceAdult male voice with a calm, neutral American accent to match the avatar.Supplemental Footage (B-roll)Stock media of serene nature scenes (forests, animals, landscapes) to complement the narration.CaptionsEnabled.
Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
